actions.comment: when a player leaves, destroy all units owned by that player
chicken does not exist at time of creation of this script

actions.htmlContent:
Great work!

Click here to return to Create Page

actions.comment: this is necessary as owner of homie may not have been assigned to Human player type yet

settings.menudiv:
Welcome to the Guided Tutorial! Let's build a game together. You can leave any time and your progress will be saved.
Move on the map with WASD or Arrow keys.

Press "Play Game" below to get started!
settings.menuHTML:
{{ loginForm }}

{{ playForm }}

dialogueview.name: Dialogue View
dialogueview.htmlData:
{{#if dialogue.dialogueTitle}}
{{dialogue.dialogueTitle}}
{{/if}}
{{dialogue.message}}
{{#each dialogue.options}} {{#if name}}
{{name}}
{{else}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}

inputModal.name: Input Modal View

customModal.name: Custom Modal View
customModal.htmlData: {{customModal.content}}

wVDdWHyGHb.name: 010. Welcome
wVDdWHyGHb.message:
Click the button to watch the introductory video:


After watching the video,
press "Next" to continue.

aVeKWqDHqL.name: 030. Making the map bigger
aVeKWqDHqL.message:
The following video tutorial will teach you how to change the map size:

Make the Map Bigger!

Goal:
  • Change Map Size to 20x20
Once you complete the goal, the tutorial will automatically proceed to the next step.

t9jAk2E7nX.name: 020. Navigating the Editor
t9jAk2E7nX.message:
Watch the following video tutorial to learn how to navigate the Moddio editor:


After watching the video, press "Next" to continue.

KmZ0yB6CQI.name: 050. Define Chicken
KmZ0yB6CQI.message:
Please follow the below video tutorial to learn how to create a new 'chicken' unit:

Define Chicken

cbu4fFZi2z.name: 040. Filling the empty tiles
cbu4fFZi2z.message:
Watch this video to learn how to fill in the empty map tiles:

Fill the empty tiles

tyvwIPuHnO.name: 060. Defining Coop
tyvwIPuHnO.message:
Please follow the below video tutorial:

Define Coop Region

Goal:
  • Create a map region called "coop".
Once you complete the goal and republish, the tutorial will automatically proceed to the next step.

xKM3vz93Ji.name: 065. Please Republish
xKM3vz93Ji.message: Once you've finished Step 6 (Defining Coop Region), please click on the [Publish] button and republish this game.

33ihrYWhIu.name: 070. Intro to Scripting
33ihrYWhIu.message:
In the next video, you will learn how to create your first script:

Scripting Basics

PLqSz7rsDn.name: 080. Spawning the Chickens
PLqSz7rsDn.message:
This video teaches you how to use scripting to spawn chickens inside the "coop" region:

Spawn the Chickens

Goal:
  • in initialize script, spawn 10 chickens at random positions inside the "coop" region.
Once you complete the goal and republish, the tutorial will automatically proceed to the next step.

UH9ADi21dA.name: 090. Adding AI to Chickens
UH9ADi21dA.message:
Learn how to add basic AI to your chickens with the next video:

Add AI to Chickens

4Jiyq6IVOG.name: 100. Build Fences & Eat Chickens
4Jiyq6IVOG.message:
Please follow the below video tutorial:

Build Fences & Eat Chickens

Goal:
  • draw fences on the map wall layer
  • remove homie wall collision
  • create a script for catching chickens
Once you complete the goals, the tutorial will automatically proceed to the next step.

ax7qDPu8Sx.name: 110. Respawning Chickens
ax7qDPu8Sx.message:
Please follow the below video tutorial:

Respawn Chickens

Goal:
  • create a number variable max_chickens_allowed and set to 10
  • create a script to respawns chickens after they are caught
Once you complete the goals, the tutorial will automatically proceed to the next step.

4Ke1ciFDJv.name: 115. Please Republish
4Ke1ciFDJv.message: Once you've completed Step 11 (Respawning Chickens), please REPUBLISH this game

cFVG3GSyiv.name: 120. Earning Points
cFVG3GSyiv.message:
For the final touch, let's give points to the player for catching chickens:

Make Players Earn Points

Goal:
  • add a player attribute "points"
  • give player a point when they catch a chicken
  • display points on the leaderboard

aBWw3xwK2o.name: 130. Let's play together
aBWw3xwK2o.message:
Congratulations, you completed the tutorial! You can now invite your friends and play together!

Let's Play Together!
